title: (x) ID Headline Font / 'Nexican Pharmacy': decorative handtooled Tuscan - Cap’n Howdy {Florian}
content:
Hi,

does anyone know a typeface close to 'NEXICAN PHAMACY'?

Thanks, St

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [decorative,ornamental,typography-73ec5e45ac469ea012c5690a11c4ea9c\_h.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200704/http:/typophile.com/files/decorative,ornamental,typography-73ec5e45ac469ea012c5690a11c4ea9c_h_1.jpg) | 84.58 KB |
author: steff_en

comments.content: [Cactus Flower Open](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200704/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/cactus-flower-sg/open-rg-sc/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DNexican%2520Pharmacy%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dot.liga%26seed%3D50) will get you pretty close.
I don't know what it is, but you can always take a look at the [Wild West](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200704/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/periods/wild_west/) FontList for similar designs.
